Mechanism.comm: Stops flow after releasing the trigger.

cont.entity_a: Takes pressure off the cartridge when the trigger is released, preventing flow.
cont.entity_b: Doesn't drip after releasing the trigger, unlike older caulk guns.
Not truly drip-free with some products, like E6800 glue.

cont.entity_a: The hanging hook and ease of loading are nice features.
cont.entity_b: Has a tip cutter and seal punch, making it versatile and user-friendly.

cont.entity_a: The puncture rod is barely long enough for some caulk tubes.

Pressure.comm: Requires little pressure to use, suitable for arthritic hands.

cont.entity_b: Requires less force than standard models, doesn't drip, and is easy on hands.

Cutter.comm: Built-in slicer or tip cutter included.

cont.entity_a: Built-in slicer to cut the tip off the caulk tube is an added bonus.
cont.entity_b: Offers smooth and controlled application with a tip cutter included.

cont.entity_a: Lightweight with good leverage for squeezing out thicker caulk easily.
cont.entity_b: Leverage makes it easier to use than cheap guns.

cont.entity_a: Makes caulking faster and easier, improving the quality of beads.
Trigger assembly pivot broke on two purchased units.
cont.entity_b: Reliable use over years with a heavy-duty build.
Has a padded grip and smooth tip cutter, making it comfortable to use.

cont.entity_a: Works great for applying adhesive to Styrofoam ceiling tiles.
Doesn't have the thrust capability for highly viscous materials.
Lightweight and ergonomic, but not suitable for roof tar.
cont.entity_b: Ergonomic handle, but difficult to reset the rod.

cont.entity_a: Smooth output, better than retail store models.
cont.entity_b: Provides much better control and less wasted caulk than cheaper models.

Control.comm: Easy to stop pressure when done.

cont.entity_a: Easy to stop pressure when done running a line of caulk.
cont.entity_b: Allows for easy control of flow and stops immediately when the trigger is released.

cont.entity_a: Composite body is rigid, more so than cheap sheet metal units.
Very easy to use with a comfortable grip.
